DivisionByZeroException: Well, it turns out that you can't divide by zero...
SyntaxErrorException: Hmm, it looks like you made a typo...
UnknownConstantException: You've used a constant I do not know... yet...
UnknownFunctionException: One of your used functions is unknown to me, blame my lazy programmer!
UnknownOperatorException: One of the operators looks like chinese for me...
UnknownTokenException: What is that kind of token?
UnknownVariableException: You forgot to tell me about one of the variables.
